questions.question: 授業が終わったら、宿題を（＿）ください。
questions.hint:
出だす (dasu) - to submit
宿題しゅくだい (shukudai) - homework

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
出して (dashite) means 'to submit.' It is commonly used when turning in homework to the teacher.

  • 飛とんで – to fly (tonde)
  • 折おって – to fold (otte)
  • 歌うたって – to sing (utatte)

Sentence meaning: Please submit your homework after class.
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect 😢
The correct answer is 1. 出だして (dashite), which means 'to turn in or submit something.'

  • 飛とんで – to fly (tonde)
  • 折おって – to fold (otte)
  • 歌うたって – to sing (utatte)

Sentence meaning: Please submit your homework after class.

questions.question: この料理は塩が（＿）すぎて食べられません。
questions.hint:
多おおい (ooi) - many, much
塩しお (shio) - salt

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
多 (oo) means 'too much.' When a dish has too much salt, it can be hard to eat.

  • 遅おそく – slow/late (osoku)
  • 高たかく – expensive/high (takaku)
  • 暗くらく – dark (kuraku)

Sentence meaning: This dish has too much salt, so I can't eat it.
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect 😢
The correct answer is 2. 多おお (oo), which means 'too much.'

  • 遅おそく – slow/late (osoku)
  • 高たかく – expensive/high (takaku)
  • 暗くらく – dark (kuraku)

Sentence meaning: This dish has too much salt, so I can't eat it.

questions.question: 弟の誕生日にケーキを（＿）あげました。

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
作って (tsukutte) means 'to make.' This sentence means the speaker made a cake for their younger brother's birthday.

  • 折おって – to fold (otte)

Incorrect 😢

questions.question: この店はよく昼の時間に（＿）います。

Correct! 🎉
込んで (konde) means 'crowded.' It is often used when referring to busy restaurants or public places.

  • 開あけて – to open (akete)

Incorrect 😢
The correct answer is 3. 込こんで (konde), meaning 'to be crowded.'

questions.question: 昨日はとても寒かったので、暖房を（＿）まま寝ました。

つける (tsukeru) - to turn on (electric device)

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
つけた (tsuketa) means 'turned on.' In this context, it refers to leaving the heater on while sleeping.

  • 抜ぬいた – pulled out (nuita)
